channel.title: Rebol2 Desktop... in a ReplPad tab?
channel.description:
In a 2019 demo, @rgchris showed off his HTML Rebol2/View-like file browser:
https://youtube.com/watch?v=sM7uGKCZMl0&t=153
With programs like [dungeon.reb](https://rebol.metaeducation.com/t/enter-the-dungeon-if-you-dare/1865) running in the browser, it seems we should have a list and let you browse them similarly...!

item.title: Rebol2 Desktop... in a ReplPad tab?

item.description:
In a 2019 demo, @rgchris showed off his HTML Rebol2/View-like file browser:

Chris Ross-Gill's Dialects and Personal Projects in Rebol

With programs like dungeon.reb running in the browser, it seems we should have a list and let you browse them similarly...!
